name: qrcode-tools
label: QRCode Tools
description: QRCode Tools helps users working with QR and Bar codes

operations.title: Read QR/Bar Code
operations.description: Read QR/Bar code(s) from an image file or attachment

parameters.title: Input Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the type of input that you want to submit to read the QR code. The input type can be an IRI or a File Path.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of input that you want to submit to read the QR code.

IRI.title: File IRI/Attachment IRI
IRI.name: file_iri
IRI.description: Specify the IRI of the image file or attachment with the QR/Bar code(s) to read.
IRI.tooltip: Specify the IRI of the image file or attachment with the QR/Bar code(s) to read

File Path.title: File Path
File Path.name: file_iri
File Path.description: Specify the name or path the file whose QR/Bar code(s) to read.
File Path.tooltip: Specify the IRI of the image file or attachment with the QR/Bar code(s) to read
